name: DigitalSpy Blue - Full Width
description:
This style changes the new, grey style of DigitalSpy to a style that more closely resembles the "old", blue and white design as created by PaulLFC, This one also uses 95% of screen.

Tested only with Chrome.
css:

.tempwrapper{max-width:99%;margin:0
auto}@font-face{font-family:'ProximaNova-Light';src:url("http://static.cdnds.net/fonts/proxima-nova-light.eot");src:url("http://static.cdnds.net/fonts/proxima-nova-light.eot?#iefix") format("svg");font-weight:normal;font-style:normal}html,body,div,span,applet,object,iframe,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p,blockquote,pre,a,abbr,acronym,address,big,cite,code,del,dfn,em,img,ins,kbd,q,s,samp,small,strike,strong,sub,sup,tt,var,b,u,i,center,dl,dt,dd,ol,ul,li,fieldset,form,label,legend,caption,article,aside,canvas,details,embed,figure,figcaption,footer,header,hgroup,menu,nav,output,ruby,section,summary,time,mark,audio,video{margin:0;padding:0;}html{font-size:14px;line-height:18px}*
html{font-size:100%}header.main *, footer.main *, #overlay
*{/* -webkit-box-sizing:border-box; */-moz-box-sizing:border-box;/* box-sizing:border-box */}header.main span, header.main span img, footer.main span, footer.main span
img{display:block}a,a:hover{text-decoration:none}ol,ul{list-style:none}.clear_left{clear:left;height:1px}.clear_both{clear:both;height:1px}.hiddentext{display:none}body{background:#0d0e20;color:#444;font-family:arial,sans-serif;-webkit-text-size-adjust:100%}article,aside,details,figcaption,figure,footer,header,hgroup,menu,nav,section,summary{display:block}.clear_both, #adposition4_container:after, .container:after, header.main:after, #wrapper div.main:after{display:table;content:"";clear:both}.para{font-family:ProximaNova-Regular,verdana,arial,sans-serif}.para.semi, .button.generic, label, header.main .container nav.main ul li a, #sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container ul.sub_menu_channels li a, #sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container .channel_content ul.channel_posts li

.close_sub_nav{font-size:15px;line-height:17px}.para.large{font-size:16px;line-height:18px}.heading.small{font-size:21px;line-height:23px;font-family:ProximaNova-Bold,verdana,arial,sans-serif;text-transform:capitalize;letter-spacing: -1px}.heading.medium, article.main header.gen_head h3, #overlay .search .relative_container input[type="text"]{font-size:23px;line-height:25px;font-family:ProximaNova-Bold,verdana,arial,sans-serif;letter-spacing: -1px}.heading.large{font-family:ProximaNova-Bold,verdana,arial,sans-serif;font-size:34px;line-height:36px;display:inline-block;letter-spacing: -1px;width:100%}.heading.large.light{font-family:ProximaNova-Light,verdana,arial,sans-serif;display: none;}strong{font-family:ProximaNova-Bold,verdana,arial,sans-serif}.default.headline,.default.heading,.default.category{color:#00b2f4}.default.headline a, .default.heading a, .default.category

a{color:#e8d56a}header.main{-webkit-box-shadow:0px 6px 5px -6px #888;-moz-box-shadow:0px 6px 5px -6px #888;box-shadow:0px 6px 5px -6px #888;background:#FFF;width:100%;z-index:999;top:0}header.main .container
h1{float:left;border-right:1px solid #CCC}header.main .container h1
a{zoom:1;width:180px;height: 40px;display:block;text-indent: -999em;padding:15px
20px;opacity:1;-webkit-transition:opacity 0.2s ease-out;-moz-transition:opacity 0.2s ease-out;-o-transition:opacity 0.2s ease-out;transition:opacity 0.2s ease-out;background-image:url("http://i2.cdnds.net/13/48/digitalspy.png");background-position:center;background-repeat:no-repeat}header.main .container h1 a:hover{opacity:0.6}header.main .container
nav.main{float:left}header.main .container nav.main
ul{float:left}header.main .container nav.main ul

a{float:left;padding:27px
14px;color:#444;-webkit-transition:background 0.2s ease-out;-moz-transition:background 0.2s ease-out;-o-transition:background 0.2s ease-out;transition:background 0.2s ease-out}header.main .container nav.main ul li a:hover{color:#FFF;background:#3b3b3b;text-decoration:none}header.main .container nav.main ul li.active
a{color:#FFF;background:#3b3b3b}header.main .container
a#search_icon{width:60px;height:70px;float:right;cursor:pointer;text-indent: -999em;opacity:1;-webkit-transition:opacity 0.2s ease-out;-moz-transition:opacity 0.2s ease-out;-o-transition:opacity 0.2s ease-out;transition:opacity 0.2s ease-out;background:url("http://i1.cdnds.net/13/46/search-icon.png") center no-repeat}header.main .container a#search_icon:hover{opacity:0.6}header.main
.container#bn_ajax{padding:10px
0;text-align:center;-webkit-box-shadow:#888 0 6px 6px -6px inset;-moz-box-shadow:#888 0 6px 6px -6px inset;box-shadow:#888 0 6px 6px -6px inset}header.main .container#bn_ajax

.sub_menu_content{display:none}#sub_nav
.sub_menu_content.active{left:0;right:0;top:70px;z-index:999;width:100%;display:block;position:fixed;background:#3b3b3b;-webkit-box-shadow:0px 6px 5px -6px #292929;-moz-box-shadow:0px 6px 5px -6px #292929;box-shadow:0px 6px 5px -6px #292929}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active
.container{position:relative;-webkit-box-shadow:#292929 0 20px 20px -20px inset;-moz-box-shadow:#292929 0 20px 20px -20px inset;box-shadow:#292929 0 20px 20px -20px inset}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container
ul.sub_menu_channels{float:left;width:220px;padding:20px
0;min-height:300px;background:#292929}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container ul.sub_menu_channels
li{float:none;border-right:none}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container ul.sub_menu_channels li
a{color:#FFF;width:100%;display:block;text-align:right;padding:10px
30px;background:transparent;-webkit-transition:background 0.2s ease-out;-moz-transition:background 0.2s ease-out;-o-transition:background 0.2s ease-out;transition:background 0.2s ease-out}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container ul.sub_menu_channels li a:hover{color:#292929}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container
.channel_content{float:left;width:705px;padding:30px}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container .channel_content
.channel_header{margin-bottom:20px}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container .channel_content .channel_header
h2{padding-right:80px;display:inline-block;font-family:ProximaNova-Bold,verdana,arial,sans-serif;font-size:23px;line-height:24px}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container .channel_content
ul.channel_posts{display:inline-block}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container .channel_content ul.channel_posts
li{float:left;margin-right:20px;border-right:none}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container .channel_content ul.channel_posts li
.component{padding:0;color:#FFF;width:141px;display:block}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container .channel_content ul.channel_posts li .component
.img{margin-bottom:20px}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container .channel_content ul.channel_posts li .component
.content{height:50px;overflow:hidden}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container .channel_content ul.channel_posts li .component:hover .img:after{width:140%}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container .channel_content ul.channel_posts li .component:hover
.headline{color:#dbdbdb}#sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container
.close_sub_nav{display:none}body.device #sub_nav .sub_menu_content.active .container
.close_sub_nav{width:35px;color:#FFF;right:20px;bottom:20px;display:block;text-align:center;position:absolute;line-height:30px;border:2px
solid #FFF;-webkit-border-radius:30px;-moz-border-radius:30px;-ms-border-radius:30px;-o-border-radius:30px;border-radius:30px}#breadcrumb_trail p, #breadcrumb_trail p
a{font-size:12px;line-height:100%;font-family:arial,sans-serif}#breadcrumb_trail
p{color:#2B2B2B}#breadcrumb_trail p
a{color:#A7A7A7}.takeover{position:absolute;top:0}.takeover.fixed.header{position:fixed;top:70px}#adposition1_container{z-index:20;width:100%;line-height:0;padding:85px
0 15px;text-align:center;position:relative;display: none;}body.parallax

#adposition1{margin:0
auto;min-width:728px;display:inline-block}body.parallax #adposition1_container
#adposition1{overflow:hidden}body.parallax

auto;min-width:728px;display:inline-block}#adposition3,#adposition10{margin-bottom:20px;padding-bottom:30px;position:relative;line-height:0}#adposition3 img, #adposition10
img{display:block}.ad_caption:after{font-size:10px;line-height:100%;content:"Advertisement";position:absolute;text-align:center;line-height:30px;background:#dbdbdb;height:30px;width:100%;color:#666;bottom:0;left:0}#gatefold-container{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;margin-left:0;z-index:1000;width:100%;height:100%;background:#FFF;overflow:hidden;display:none}#gatefold-container object, #gatefold-container
embed{position:absolute;top:0;left:50%;width:1920px;margin-left: -960px}#modal-overlay{position:fixed;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;left:0;z-index:6000;background:#808080;background:rgba(0,0,0,.5);filter:alpha(opacity=50);}#modal-box{position:absolute;z-index:6100;width:618px;margin:0;padding:10px;background-color:#fff;border:1px

a.close{position:absolute;top:-10px;right:-12px;width:30px;height:30px;display:block;background:url(http://i2.cdnds.net/12/08/register_close.png) no-repeat}#modal-box .modal-loading{width:100px;height:32px;margin:0

0 0 40px;display:block}body.modal{background:#fff !important}body.modal
#content{margin:0
!important;overflow:hidden}footer.main{width:100%;background:#282828}body.parallax
footer.main{z-index:20;position:relative}footer.main .container
.module{float:left;width:100%;padding:40px
20px 40px 20px;border-bottom:1px dashed #FFF}footer.main .container .module
#footer_links{width:150px;float:left}footer.main .container .module #footer_links
#footer_logo{width:150px;height:33px;display:block;text-indent: -999em;margin-bottom:17px;background:url("http://i1.cdnds.net/13/48/digitalspy-white.png") center no-repeat}footer.main .container .module #footer_links
ul{width:100%;display:inline-block}footer.main .container .module #footer_links ul
li{width:50%;float:left;padding-right:10px;margin-bottom:8px}footer.main .container .module #footer_links ul li
a{font-size:13px;line-height:15px;font-family:ProximaNova-Regular,verdana,arial,sans-serif;color:#6c6c6c;display:block;width:100%}footer.main .container .module #footer_links ul li a:hover{color:#FFF}footer.main .container .module
#about_links{width:690px;float:right}footer.main .container .module #about_links
.component{width:230px;float:left}footer.main .container .module #about_links .component
.title{width:100%;color:#6c6c6c;padding-top:10px;margin-bottom:22px;font-family:ProximaNova-Semibold,verdana,arial,sans-serif;font-size:15px;line-height:17px}footer.main .container .module #about_links ul.component ul, footer.main .container .module #about_links ul.component ul
li{width:100%;display:block}footer.main .container .module #about_links ul.component ul a, footer.main .container .module #about_links ul.component ul li
a{width:100%;color:#FFF;font-family:ProximaNova-Regular,verdana,arial,sans-serif;font-size:13px;line-height:15px}footer.main .container .module #about_links ul.component ul a:hover, footer.main .container .module #about_links ul.component ul li a:hover{color:#6c6c6c}footer.main .container .module #about_links div.component
ul{display:inline-block}footer.main .container .module #about_links div.component ul

.search{position:absolute;margin-top: -60px;width:100%;left:0;top:50%}#overlay .search
.relative_container{position:relative;display:block;margin:0

70px 20px 20px;background:#FFF;border:none}#overlay .search .relative_container
.submit{border:none;background:url("http://i1.cdnds.net/13/46/search-icon.png") no-repeat center;text-indent: -999em;position:absolute;margin-top: -20px;height:40px;width:40px;right:15px;top:50%}#overlay .search .relative_container
.close{position:absolute;font-family:arial,verdana,sans-serif;top: -20px;right:0;font-size:12px;line-height:100%;color:#FFF;cursor:pointer;font-weight:bold}#overlay .search .relative_container .close:hover{text-decoration:none}.container{width:95%;padding:0

header.main
{
  position:relative;
}
 
 
header.main .container h1 a {  
height: 40px;
}
 
header.main .container nav.main ul li a {
padding: 12px 10px;
}
 
header.main .container a#search_icon {
height: 40px;
}
 
.alt2 a:link, .alt2 a:visited, .alt2 a:hover
{
  font-weight:bold;
  color: #1E4981;
}

{
  color: #ffffff;
}

{

}

color: #2960A7;
}

{

{

{

}
